member.name: P:BindOpen.Application.Products.ProductInformation.MajorUpdateLevel
member.summary: Indicates when a version can be considered as major.
member.remarks: Versions are formated as a.b.c.d. When the major update level equals to 0, the version will be considered as major only if its a.b.c.d is greater than the current ones. When the major update level equals to 1, the version will be considered as major only if its a.b.c is greater than the current ones. When the major update level equals to 2, the version will be considered as major only if its a.b is greater than the current ones. When the major update level equals to 3, the version will be considered as major only if its a is greater than the current ones.
